title: 206: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 8 (Bennett Scares Us + Tayshia is Falling in Love!)
itunes:title: 206: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 8 (Bennett Scares Us + Tayshia is Falling in Love!)
description:
This episode was a ROLLERCOASTER! The Broads chat about all the emotional and vulnerable pieces of the episode (Zac’s 1-on-1 and the “self-portrait” group date). They also chat about the WILD pieces of this episode (Blake’s sculpture and ghost hunting). And, of course, they discuss in depth NOAH VS BENNETT - “Young Noah”, “Privilege”, The Blindfold, the 2-on-1, and Bennett’s “gift” *screams in horror*! Tayshia continues to be our favorite + so much more!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

MODERN FERTILITY:  Get $20 off the test when you go to Modernfertility.com/CHATTY 

FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to Framebridge.com and use promo code CHATTY to save an additional 15% off your first order!

STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at Stamps.com and click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY


FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:
